title: Ever Since Playing On Windows 8.1 I've Been Ping Spiking
body: Tested playing league on 2 different laptops in a custom bot game for 10 minutes , the one running windows 7 constant 50 ping  the other running windows 8.1 ping spike every 3minutes 90 to around 400 max from 50.  I was wondering if a riot employee or anyone who understands the log files could help me understand why this is ive attached the network and r3dlog files from the windows 8.1 computer

replies.body:
Windows 8.1 may have TCP delay enabled. It was hard for me to understand, but the basic concept is that Windows will delay a packet of data to make sure that its time-stamp matches up correctly before processing it. Probably for security, or something insane like that.

It's hard to change, but possible. Tell me if you want to try it.

bah i just hit the repair my pc option on start went for the refresh option seems to have fixed it constant 50 ping the last 2 games in urf mode looking good so far. might actually get to play ranked if my next 10 games go well havnt touch ranked in 2 weeks because of this issue :(

With these sorts of things, you should try everything simple first, and then move to the more complicated stuff.

Congrats on being able to fix it.
